column1: '''Angus McBride''' ([[1931]] - [[15 May]] [[2007]]) was a Scottish artist who specialized in historical and mythological illustrations.<ref>''[[Angus McBride's Characters of Middle-earth]]'', p.4.</ref> In the 1980s and 1990s, McBride was commissioned by [[Iron Crown Enterprises
column2: ICE]] to create covers for ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]'' and to make card art for the ''[[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game

column1: *''[[Angus McBride's Characters of Middle-earth]]'' (art collection and RPG module)
